structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Fees for licenses, permits, and identification cards.

text.section: The remainder of all fees, and other moneys collected by the circuit clerk shall be forwarded to road fund.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 7, effective June 20, 2005; ch. 122, sec. 10, effective July 1, 2005; and ch. 173, Pt.
